first_para: Sir Alan Gordon Barraclough Haselhurst (born 23 June 1937) is a British Conservative politician who has been the Member of Parliament (MP) for Saffron Walden since 1977. Previously he was the MP for Middleton and Prestwich from 1970 to 1974. He was Chairman of Ways and Means from 14 May 1997 to 8 June 2010.

full.extract:
Sir Alan Gordon Barraclough Haselhurst (born 23 June 1937) is a British Conservative politician who has been the Member of Parliament (MP) for Saffron Walden since 1977. Previously he was the MP for Middleton and Prestwich from 1970 to 1974. He was Chairman of Ways and Means from 14 May 1997 to 8 June 2010.
^ Hansard
full.title: Alan Haselhurst
